channel.title: Mapping on Secret Chipmunk
channel.description: Recent content in Mapping on Secret Chipmunk

item.title: Quality Wardley Maps
item.description: Mapping If you are not familiar with Simon Wardley and his world of mapping you need to first jump over to his blog-book on mapping. It is a detailed set of pages that are well worth your time to read through and practice. Quality Attributes Quality Attributes (QAs) are those non-functional traits that we try to describe and require when designing processes, systems, and software. They describe a quality of the thing in question.
